name: Train brain (EasySmallGames)
description:
A simple brain training game that contains such game modes as:

  1. Mosaic of memory
  2. Sequence mosaic
  3. What block is new?
  4. Symmetry
  5. Memorizing numbers
  6. Mathematics
  7. Schulte table
  8. Stroop test

In this game there is a "own game" mode, in which you can configure the necessary parameters for a comfortable game
